name: space war (itch) (mrimagination)
description: an eyeball and a mustache got mad at each other and now there fighting .     controls  player 1 eye ball press A and D to turn and press W to move forward.  player 2  mustache press the left and right arrow keys to turn and press up arrow key to move forward. now to shoot for player 1 press F and for player 2 press L . have fun
